query: How do I cancel my Klaviyo subscription?
response: To cancel your Klaviyo subscription, go to your account settings, click on 'Billing' and select 'Cancel Subscription'. Confirm the cancellation to stop future payments.

execution_details.authentication: Private API key or OAuth token
execution_details.implementation: Send a DELETE request to the API endpoint with the account ID and confirmation of cancellation.
execution_details.error_handling: Handle 401 for unauthorized access, 404 for account not found, and 500 for internal server errors.

query: Can I downgrade my Klaviyo plan?
response: Yes, you can downgrade your Klaviyo plan at any time. Go to your account settings, click on 'Billing', and select 'Change Plan'. Choose your new plan and confirm the change.

execution_details.authentication: Private API key or OAuth token
execution_details.implementation: Send a PATCH request to the API endpoint with the new plan details.
execution_details.error_handling: Handle 401 for unauthorized access, 404 for plan not found, and 500 for internal server errors.

query: How do I update my payment method in Klaviyo?
response: To update your payment method, go to your account settings, click on 'Billing', and select 'Payment Method'. Enter your new payment details and save the changes.

execution_details.authentication: Private API key or OAuth token
execution_details.implementation: Send a PUT request to the API endpoint with the updated payment details.
execution_details.error_handling: Handle 401 for unauthorized access, 422 for invalid payment details, and 500 for internal server errors.

query: Can I pause my Klaviyo subscription?
response: Yes, you can pause your Klaviyo subscription for up to 3 months. Go to your account settings, click on 'Billing', and select 'Pause Subscription'. Choose the pause duration and confirm.

execution_details.authentication: Private API key or OAuth token
execution_details.implementation: Send a POST request to the API endpoint with the pause duration.
execution_details.error_handling: Handle 401 for unauthorized access, 404 for subscription not found, and 500 for internal server errors.

query: How do I reactivate my canceled Klaviyo subscription?
response: To reactivate your canceled Klaviyo subscription, go to your account settings, click on 'Billing', and select 'Reactivate Subscription'. Confirm the reactivation to resume your subscription.

execution_details.authentication: Private API key or OAuth token
execution_details.implementation: Send a POST request to the API endpoint with the account ID and confirmation of reactivation.
execution_details.error_handling: Handle 401 for unauthorized access, 404 for subscription not found, and 500 for internal server errors.
